Download and Installation

 Updating eduHelp

You can easily update eduHelp from your phone's applications store.

* For Android, search for eduHelp in the Play Store app and tap Update.
* For iPhone, search for eduHelp in the App Store app and tap Update.

We encourage you to always use the latest available version of eduHelp. Latest versions contain the newest features and bug fixes.

 Supported operating systems

The following platforms are supported:

* Android running OS 8.0+ 
* iPhone running iOS 11.0+

These platforms offer the kind of capabilities we need to expand our app's features in the future. If you are using older operating systems, we recommend upgrading to a newer OS version, or to a newer Android running OS 8.0+ and iPhone running iOS 11.0+  so that you can continue using eduHelp.

Once you have one of these devices, simply install eduHelp and verify your phone number on the new device. Keep in mind that eduHelp can only be activated with one phone number on one device at a time.
